fulltext:
Do Dinh Anh 
Web Developer 
Gender: Male 
Phone: +84 987.196.695 
Email: dinhanhdo95@gmail.com 
SUMMARY 
I'm Do Dinh Anh, a web developer with 2 years of experience in JavaScript and .NET 
technologies, with good knowledge of Object-Oriented and Design Patterns.  
Learning new languages and technologies is what I’m really keen on. I’m considered a team-
player because I prefer to discuss innovative ideas with others and tend to work well within the group. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
• 
Programming Languages: 
- 
JavaScript, C#.NET 
- 
HTML5, CSS3 
• 
Frameworks/ Platforms: 
- 
ReactJS, Angular 
- 
Webpack, Gulp, Babel 
- 
ES6, Typescript 
- 
jQuery, Sass, Twitter Bootstrap 
- 
ASP.NET MVC, Web API 
- 
Entity Framework 
• 
Database Management Systems: 
- 
MS SQL Server, MySQL 
• 
Version Control: 
- 
Git, SVN 
• 
Foreign Languages: 
English: 
- 
Good reading/writing 
- 
Basic verbal communication 
• 
Soft Skills: 
- 
Time management 
- 
Problem solving 
- 
Teamwork 
• 
Others: 
- 
Good understanding of OOP methodologies 
- 
Experience with Agile and Scrum development process 
Working Experiences  
Web Developer / NTQ Solution 
• 
Project: Serimu Jvideos 
03/2019 – 10/2019 
- 
Project Description: An enhanced experience video system. It attracts creators and 
makers to join the system so that they can improve, contribute to it and then viewers 
can enjoy and wind down whenever they want. 
- 
Team Size: 22 
- 
Responsibilities: 
Communicate with customers and teammates to clarify requirements 
Develop key modules of the system that saved around 20% of the development 
time of other functionalities 
- 
Technologies: ReactJS, Redux, Webpack, Sass, Ant Design 
• 
Project: Pronexus-Works 
12/2018 – 03/2019 
- 
Project Description: Develop a local desktop application, it’s one of a system lies in 
a huge ecosystem of the organization that is taking up 60% of finance in the 
Japanese market and manages tons of documents and links related to that field. 
- 
Team Size: 7 
- 
Responsibilities: 
Analyze specifications and recommend the best solutions to the customer 
Design screens and build up features based on requirements  
- 
Technologies: WPF, WCF, Telerik UI, Oracle Database 
Project: M-Solutions ARMS 
08/2018 – 12/2018 
- 
Project Description: Dealing with the client side of a firing alarm system so that the 
customer can completely be in control of problems accurately. 
- 
Team Size: 6 
- 
Responsibilities: 
Communicate with customers and teammates to report daily works 
Build up features and implement unit tests based on requirements 
- 
Technologies: ReactJS, Redux, Saga, ImmutableJS, Reselect, Jest 
Project: M-Solutions Sale System 
05/2018 – 08/2018 
- 
Project Description: Develop a sale and customer management system. Which has 
highly complicated kind of banking business 
- 
Team Size: 18 
- 
Responsibilities: 
Build screens according to specifications 
Interact data across sophisticatedly existing services 
Write test cases and execute them 
- 
Technologies: Dynamics 365, jQuery, JavaScript, CSS3, HTML5 
Junior Developer / PowerGate Software 
Project: OneIT Mobile 
11/2017 – 04/2018 
• 
• 
• 
- 
Project Description: Develop a mobile management system. To better assist 
customers that can quickly give options and select suitable mobile phones 
conveniently. 
- 
Team Size: 3 
- 
Responsibilities: 
Communicate with customers to get clear requirements 
Compose APIs and evolve modules of the system 
- 
Technologies: Angular 2, HTML5, CSS3, ASP.NET Web API, Entity Framework, MS SQL 
Server 
Project: OneIT CoventryCRM 
06/2017 – 11/2017 
- 
Project Description: A meeting management application supports people to book 
their customer's appointments with anyone whenever they want, from wherever 
you are. 
- 
Team Size: 6 
- 
Responsibilities: 
Communicate with customers and teammates to get clear requirements 
Develop the frameworks and modules of the system 
- 
Technologies: Angular 2, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap 3
